data: “The horror first took concrete form amid that most unconcrete of all things—a hashish dream.”
"The horror first took concrete form amid that most unconcrete of all things--a hashish dream."
Howard, Robert E. (Robert Ervin), 1906-1936; Rankin, Hugh, 1878-1956 [Illustrator]
